CHEMICAL TARFARE POLICY."TC7?. 295(26)).MINUTE 2. IMPERIAL DEFENCE -POLICY.MINUTE 4. SINGAPORE NAVAL BASE ETC".(CP. 297(26) ) .MINUTE 5.AFGHANISTAN.-*TC.P."298(26).(Sd.) M.P.A. HANKEY,Secretary, Cabinet.Note. The enclosures referred, to above are not attached in the case of Ministers who have already received, them as Members of the Committee of Imperial Defence.2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.I. 29th July, 1926.
